component.name: blivet-gui
component.summary: Graphical tool for storage manipulation and configuration

description.p: Blivet-gui is a graphical tool that provides an easy way to create, delete or edit partitions, LVM, RAID or Btrfs volumes.
Available advanced options includes setting up encrypted devices (LUKS), LVM or Btrfs volumes spanning more drives and creating kickstart files for automated installations.
